description:
NVIDIA 560 Linux graphics driver is now available for public beta testing with open GPU kernel modules enabled by default, as well as numerous other new features and improvements.

The post NVIDIA 560 Beta Linux Driver Released with Open GPU Kernel Modules by Default appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVIDIA 560 Beta Linux Driver Released with Open GPU Kernel Modules by Default

description:
Linux Mint 22 "Wilma" is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.8 and based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS "Noble Numbat". Here's what's new!

The post Linux Mint 22 “Wilma” Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux Mint 22 “Wilma” Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
